buffs.name: Spirit Awakening 2
buffs.description: Maximum level-up increases for all units even if Paladin is in the Time Shop (5-star 5 levels, 6 star 10 levels, Max 50 levels).

buffs.name: Offline Limit Break
buffs.description: Increase the maximum stage of offline march even if Paladin is in the Time Shop (5-star 0.2%, 6-star 0.4%, Max 4%).

buffs.name: Elf's Secret Skill of Space-Time
buffs.description: For every 100 stages, there is a chance to skip 20 stages. (5-star 3%, 6-star 5%, only applied when they are in the team).

buffs.name: Spirit Awakening 2
buffs.description: Maximum level-up increases for all units even if Skeleton Master is in the Time Shop (5-star 5 levels, 6 star 10 levels, Max 50 levels).

buffs.name: Offline Limit Break
buffs.description: Increase the maximum stage of offline march even if Skeleton Master is in the Time Shop (5-star 0.2%, 6-star 0.4%, Max 4%).

buffs.name: Increase Auto-skill Efficiency
buffs.description: There is a chance to reduce the cooldown of skills when using auto-skill. Applies even if Battle Hornist is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2%, Max 20%).

buffs.name: Mental Stimulation
buffs.description: When active skills are used, there is a certain chance that the cooldown is reset (5-star 0.25%, 6-star 0.5%, Max 5%, Only applied in scenarios).

buffs.name: Surprise Attack
buffs.description: Each Crimson Hawk Rider on the team increases chance of flying fast towards enemy crystal (5-star 3%, 6-star 5%, Max 30%).

buffs.name: Airship VIP
buffs.description: Airship fuel purchase costs are reduced even if Astral Captain is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2%, Max 20%).

buffs.name: Revival Team for Spirit Rest Runs
buffs.description: When included in team, receive 30% additional medals during revival.

buffs.name: Enhance active skill
buffs.description: Increases efficiency of The Explosion Shaking Heaven and Earth, Tower of Babel and Skyward Sword (not applied from time shop) (5-star 20 stages, 6-star 40 stages).

buffs.name: Human Token
buffs.description: Increases the Human tribe friendliness that is gained from Human unit seals even if Musketress is in the Time Shop (5-star 5%, 6-star 10%, Max 100%).

buffs.name: Elf Token
buffs.description: Increases the Elf tribe friendliness that is gained from Elf unit seals even if Elf Sage is in the Time Shop (5-star 5%, 6-star 10%, Max 100%).

buffs.name: Undead Token
buffs.description: Increases the Undead tribe friendliness that is gained from Undead unit seals even if Crow Knight is in the Time Shop (5-star 5%, 6-star 10%, Max 100%).

buffs.name: Darkness Resistance
buffs.description: Increases darkness resistance even if Crow Knight is in the Time Shop (5-star 50, 6-star 100, Max 2000).

buffs.name: Orc Token
buffs.description: Increases the Orc tribe friendliness that is gained from Orc unit seals even if Rangda is in the Time Shop (5-star 5%, 6-star 10%, Max 100%).

buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness
buffs.description: Increases the Tribe Friendliness for Human even if Winged Knight is in the Time Shop (5-star 10, 6 star 20, Max 400).

buffs.name: Wings of Zephyrus
buffs.description: Increases the effieciency of boosting game speed when Winged Knight is included in your team (5-star 0.05, 6-star 0.1). For example, if you have four 5-star Winged Knights and three 6-star Winged Knights in your current team, then the game speed(x2,x3,x5) will be x2.5, x3.5 and x5.5, respectively.

buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness
buffs.description: Increases the Tribe Friendliness for Elf even if Windwalker is in the Time Shop (5-star 10, 6 star 20, Max 400).

buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness
buffs.description: Increases the Tribe Friendliness for Undead even if Abyss Mage is in the Time Shop (5-star 10, 6 star 20, Max 400).

buffs.name: Tribe Friendliness
buffs.description: Increases the Tribe Friendliness for Orc even if Octopa is in the Time Shop (5-star 10, 6 star 20, Max 400).

buffs.name: Dimensional Binding (Human and Orc)
buffs.description: Increase the attack power, HP, and defense power of Human and Orc units in the Outland battle even if Cleric is in the Time Shop (5-star 5%, 6-star 10%, Max 150%).

buffs.name: Tribe Fortification (Human and Orc)
buffs.description: Increases the Human unit’s ability (attack power/defense power/HP) (5-star 10 levels, 6-star 20 levels), and Orc unit’s ability (5-star 5 levels, 6-star 10 levels) when included in the team (Max 150 levels).

buffs.name: Innervate 2
buffs.description: Reduces Outland Battle skill cool time even if Cleric is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 3%, Max 40%).

buffs.name: Dimensional Binding 2 (Elf and Human)
buffs.description: Increase the attack speed, movement speed, and critical damage of Elf and Human units in the Outland battle even if Elementalist is in the Time Shop (5-star 5%, 6-star 10%, Max 150%).

buffs.name: Tribe Fortification (Elf and Human)
buffs.description: Increases the Elf unit’s ability (attack power/defense power/HP) (5-star 7 levels, 6-star 15 levels), and Human unit’s ability (5-star 4 levels, 6-star 8 levels) when included in the team (Max 150 levels).

buffs.name: Nature Resistance
buffs.description: Increases nature resistance even if Elementalist is in the Time Shop (5-star 50, 6-star 100, Max 2000).

buffs.name: Dimensional Binding 1 (Undead and Elf)
buffs.description: Increase the attack power, HP, and defense power of Undead and Elf units in the Outland battle even if Dark Elf is in the Time Shop (5-star 5%, 6-star 10%, Max 150%).

buffs.name: Tribe Fortification (Undead and Elf)
buffs.description: Increases the Undead unit’s ability (attack power/defense power/HP) (5-star 10 levels, 6-star 20 levels), and Elf unit’s ability (5-star 5 levels, 6-star 10 levels) when included in the team (Max 150 levels).

buffs.name: Dimensional Binding 2 (Orc and Undead)
buffs.description: Increase the attack speed, movement speed, and critical damage of Orc and Undead units in the Outland battle even if Elementalist is in the Time Shop (5-star 5%, 6-star 10%, Max 150%).

buffs.name: Tribe Fortification (Orc and Undead)
buffs.description: Increases the Orc unit’s ability (attack power/defense power/HP) (5-star 7 levels, 6-star 15 levels), and Undead unit’s ability (5-star 4 levels, 6-star 8 levels) when included in the team (Max 150 levels).

buffs.name: Elevates the first Stage after the Revival
buffs.description: When Reviving, start at a percentage of the previously reached level. (not applied from Time Shop)(5-star 2%, 6-star 5%) For Example, if you previously reached staged 100 and you had 2 5-star Dark Archers and 3 6-star Dark Archers included in your team you would revive at stage 19.
